Instruction: In a mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Mix in the egg and vanilla until well combined.
Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until firm.
Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until the edges are lightly browned. Allow to cool on wire racks before serving.

In a large saucepan, combine sugar, corn syrup, salt, and water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Let it boil without stirring until the mixture reaches 240 degrees F (115 degrees C) on a candy thermometer.
